item.title: Reflections on the Post Office Horizon Enquiry
item.description: Photo by Cameron Readius from Pexels I won’t be the only person who has been reading about the Post Office Horizon scandal ever since Rebecca Thomson wrote about it in May 2009 in Computer Weekly (“Bankruptcy, prosecution and disrupted livelihoods â€“ postmasters tell their story”) all of which is nicely summed up in Private Eye. And likewise, I’ve been a little bemused by serious business leaders being unaware that Post Office were carrying through their own prosecutions (not the Police and Crown Prosecution Service) and even more bemused that senior executive’s environmental scanning doesn’t include hearing about these media reports.
